//: This file defines the available AI 'personas' for towers. Each persona has a user-facing name, a description, and maps to a specific sorting function in the targeting logic.

SOLDIER.name: Soldier
SOLDIER.description: Targets the enemy closest to the tower.

EXECUTIONER.name: Executioner
EXECUTIONER.description: Targets the enemy that is furthest along the path (closest to the base).

SNIPER.name: Sniper
SNIPER.description: Targets the enemy with the highest maximum health.

ASSASSIN.name: Assassin
ASSASSIN.description: Targets the enemy with the lowest current health.

CONTAGION.name: Contagion
CONTAGION.description: Prioritizes enemies that are not currently affected by this tower's primary debuff.

ARTILLERY.name: Artillery
ARTILLERY.description: Targets the enemy with the most other enemies nearby.

ARMOR_PIERCER.name: Armor Piercer
ARMOR_PIERCER.description: Targets the enemy with the highest armor value.

SHREDDER.name: Shredder
SHREDDER.description: Targets the enemy with the lowest armor value.
